College of Applied Health Sciences     Search the site      Toggle Menu     Search             College of Applied Health Sciences     College of Applied Health Sciences   Google Translate  Main Menu    Applying          Degrees and Deadlines    Beyond the Classroom    Tuition and Aid    Newly Admitted Students      Academics           Departments and Programs         Biomedical and Health Information Sciences           Disability and Human Development           Kinesiology and Nutrition           Occupational Therapy           Physical Therapy           Rehabilitation Sciences         Departments and Programs      Research          Research Labs and Centers    Metabolic Kitchen      Community Services          Assistive Technology Unit    Developmental Disabilities Family Clinic    Occupational Therapy Faculty Practice    Physical Therapy Faculty Practice      Alumni          Give to AHS          Give to AHS    Where to Give      AHS Alumni Awards          Alumni Award Recipients      Meet Our Alumni    Corporate Partners Program    News    Events    Contact      About AHS          College News    College Calendar    Committees    Contact       Eyebrow menu    Inside AHS    AHS Directory    Give to AHS    UIC menu    UIC.edu    UI Health    Campus Map      Search the site                     COVID-19 on Inside AHS  COVID-19 updates, resources and announcements for AHS students, faculty and staff        View Menu            Breadcrumbs   Home  AHS Alumni  Corporate Partners Program      Corporate Partners Program  Corporate partnerships play a significant role in student development. Industry relationships help sustain a collaborative learning environment that promotes engagement with company representatives and exposure to real-world challenges and conditions for students. Corporate philanthropic support also strengthens AHS in its efforts to broaden understanding of applied health sciences and disability and to expand opportunities for its students.  The AHS Corporate Partners Program provides numerous opportunities for its corporate members, including:  Access to AHS leadership to advise, provide industry perspective, and impact curriculum development.  Recruit a targeted student demographic through early access to expanded recruiting opportunities.  Collaborate with students and faculty on sponsored research projects and other opportunities.  Reach thousands of AHS students, faculty and staff via targeted marketing and branding strategies.  Receive access to AHS faculty and facilities for corporate consultations, meetings and focus groups.            Corporate Partners Program Benefits Partner Associate Supporter      Membership to the AHS Dean’s Advisory Council ✓    Host an AHS Partners Day ✓    Submit one industry-sponsored student project ✓    Direct access to the college dean ✓ ✓    Access to AHS faculty ✓ ✓    Serve as an industry guest speaker ✓ ✓    Receive invitations to attend AHS events ✓ ✓ ✓    Sponsor an AHS event, competition or award ✓ ✓ ✓    Host AHS students in your facilities ✓ ✓ ✓    Access AHS facilities ✓ ✓ ✓    Acknowledgement in AHS Magazine ✓ ✓ ✓    Recognition on the AHS website ✓ ✓ ✓                  Contact Larry McCollum, director of corporate relations, to learn how your company can become an AHS Corporate Partner Program member.    You can contact Larry at:     Email  lmccoll@uic.edu      Phone  (312) 413-8891      Address  601 S.
